name: Berserker: Safehold Redux (prototype)
description: This is a prototype for the upcoming Berserker: Safehold Redux. An all new release that adds a brand new level to the ending of the game. Collect all of the collectable coins throughout both levels to unlock the epilogue level: Retaliation. In this level, the Berserker finally gets his hands on a weapon and is able to lead the Everfrees in a counter-attack against the Omega Legion.
